title: Los Angeles bishop joins Catholic leadership in concerns over Trump travel ban
text: "These new orders do not change the fact that our nation needs true and lasting reform of our immigration system," he wrote. "Do we really want to hand over the fate of millions of fathers, mothers and children to overworked caseworkers in an underfunded immigration court system? A policy of enforcement only — without reform of the underlying system — will only lead to a human rights nightmare."
summary:
"These new orders do not change the fact that our nation needs true and lasting reform of our immigration system," he wrote.
"Do we really want to hand over the fate of millions of fathers, mothers and children to overworked caseworkers in an underfunded immigration court system?
A policy of enforcement only — without reform of the underlying system — will only lead to a human rights nightmare."
